item.title: About
item.description:
Humans now have a lower attention span than goldfish and you now have less time than ever to connect with your readers and/or customers: you have less than 8 seconds. If you’re still reading this paragraph, you’re engaged. If you want to know why you’re still reading this paragraph, read the next paragraph.

CONCISELY delivers clear, creative language that’s engaging, easily read, and instantly absorbed. Specialising in short-form writing — ads, blurbs, slogans, CTAs, value propositions, product descriptions, etc. — ‘More in less’ is our style, strength, and super power.

Before writing anything we research everything — your brand, products/services, customers, competitors — so when we write we write real. Using logic, empathy, and art we craft the most complicated concepts into beautiful, usable, actionable messages… and we don’t use adverbs lightly.


More in less: CONCISELY.
